title: 【行动起来】白宫联署 禁止中国的互联网公司在美国经营
contents:
这是知名政论youtuber、品葱用户虞超 （@charleshugo）老师创建的联署。

白宫链接：

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/ban-all-chinese-social-mediasearching-enginesonline-business-platformsvideo-platformsonline-payment-platforms-etc




“川普总统谈到了贸易上的互惠。我们应该在所有事情上实现互惠。”——2020年2月8日国务卿蓬佩奥在全国州长协会上的讲话

就像中国政府禁止谷歌、脸书、Netflix、Paypal、Ebay等一样，我们呼吁美国政府在美国境内禁止微信、抖音、百度、阿里巴巴和搜狐以及所有中国社交媒体、搜索引擎、在线商业平台、视频平台、在线支付平台等。中国政府一直利用这些应用程序作为消息来源，恶意影响美国人民的舆论，这使它们成为国家安全的威胁。


英文不好的可以看过来,签名很简单：

打开网站后，拉下去有个Sign This Petition的三个栏目，直接填姓名(也可以化名)，最后一个填你的email (不要用国内邮箱！)，接下来你就能看见白宫给你发邮件，然后点开邮件拉下去点击第一行蓝字Confirm your signature by clicking here。最后跳转网页就行了。


"President Trump has talked about reciprocity in trade. We should have reciprocity in all things"- The speech in National Governors Association by Michael Pompeo, Secretary of State,Feb. 8th, 2020
Just as the Chinese government bans Google, Facebook, Netflix, Paypal, eBay, etc. We appeal US government bans Wechat, TikTok, Baidu, Alibaba, Alipay and Sohu and all Chinese social media/searching engines/online business platforms/video platforms/online payment platforms, etc. in the U.S. territory. The Chinese government has been using these apps as sources to viciously influence the public opinions of American people, which makes them a national security threat.
